lead_paragraph: Republican front-runner Donald Trump said on Wednesday that when it comes to the polls in the crowded 2016 presidential race, "the only thing constant is Trump."

headline.main: Trump on Polls: 'Only Thing Constant Is Trump'
headline.print_headline: Trump on Polls: 'Only Thing Constant Is Trump'

snippet: Republican front-runner Donald Trump said on Wednesday that when it comes to the polls in the crowded 2016 presidential race, "the only thing constant is Trump."...
